R

RacecarDriver - Class in cards.career_cards
Class implementing a Racecar Driver career card, which dictates the player's career, degree requirement (whether it is required or not), and maximum number of pay raises associated with being a racecar driver
RacecarDriver() - Constructor for class cards.career_cards.RacecarDriver
Creates a Racecar Driver career card object
RacecarDriverTestScript - Class in <Unnamed>
Test script for RacecarDriver class
RacecarDriverTestScript() - Constructor for class RacecarDriverTestScript

Updates the current cash of the player after receiving a specified amount of cash
receiveCash(Player, int) - Method in class core.Bank
Receives the specified amount of cash from a player (not counted as a loan payment)
receivePayment(Player, int) - Method in class core.Bank
Receives the specified number of loan payments of a player
receivePayRaise() - Method in class core.Player
Increases the current number of pay raises of this player by 1
receivePayRaise(int) - Method in class core.GameMaster
Allows the player with the specified ID to receive a pay raise

retire(int) - Method in class core.GameMaster
Performs the instructions when a player retires (that is, when he/she landed on the end space) and removes him/her from the list of active players, effectively excluding him/her from the switching of turns
retire(Bank, int, CareerCardDeck, SalaryCardDeck, HouseCardDeck) - Method in class core.Player
Modifies the player attributes based on the specifications when this player retires
RETIREMENT_BENEFIT_FIRST - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Retirement benefit added to the cash of the first player to reach the last space
RETIREMENT_BENEFIT_SECOND - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Retirement benefit added to the cash of the second player to reach the last space
RETIREMENT_BENEFIT_THIRD - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Retirement benefit added to the cash of the third player (in the three-player mode) to reach the last space
RETIREMENT_CHILDREN_BENEFIT - Static variable in class core.GameMaster
Retirement benefit added to the cash of the each player per children
returnCard(Card) - Method in class decks.Deck
Transfers a given card back into the deck
returnCard(Card, Deck) - Method in class core.Player

returnCardsTo(Deck) - Method in class core.DiscardPile
